```{r}
library(rethinking)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(ggthemes)
theme_set(theme_pander())
```

```{r}
# set sim parameters
num_sims <- 1000
sample_size <- 100
totn <- num_sims * sample_size

bSA <- 1
bXA <- 1
bXS <- 1
bYA <- 1
bYS <- 1
bYX <- 1

# create data and split into different sim runs
sims <- tibble(
  sim_id = 1:num_sims) |> 
  uncount(sample_size) |> 
  mutate(A = rnorm(totn, 0, 1),
         S = rnorm(totn, bSA*A, 1),
         X = rnorm(totn, bXS*S + bXA*A, 1),
         Y = rnorm(totn, bYS*S + bYX*X + bYA*A, 1)) |> 
  group_by(sim_id) |> 
  nest()

glimpse(sims)
```

```{r}
myfit <- function(data) {
  lm(Y ~ X + S + A,
     data = data) |> 
    tidy()
}
```

```{r}
sims <- sims |>
  mutate(fits = purrr::map(data, myfit))
```

```{r}
results <- sims |> 
  unnest(fits) |> 
  select(sim_id, term, estimate) |> 
  filter(term != "(Intercept)")
```

```{r}
ggplot(results,
       aes(x = estimate,
           group = term,
           color = term)) +
  geom_density()
```
